step0.title: Welcome to the Housing Registration
step0.description: Register for the official housing waiting list in Suriname.
step0.aboutText: This registration places you on the official housing waiting list managed by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Housing. Registration does not guarantee immediate housing allocation. Allocation is based on availability, urgency, and waiting list position.
step0.requirement3: Information about your current living situation
step0.acknowledgementLabel: I understand that this is a registration for the housing waiting list and that placement does not guarantee immediate housing. I confirm that I will provide accurate information.

step1.title: Personal Identification
step1.description: Please provide your personal details as they appear on your National ID.

step2.title: Contact Information
step2.description: How can we reach you regarding your registration?

step3.title: Current Living Situation
step3.description: Tell us about where you currently live.

step4.title: Housing Preference
step4.description: What type of housing are you interested in?
step4.note: Your preferred district is used for allocation prioritization. Final allocation may be in a different district based on availability.

step5.title: Reason for Application
step5.description: Why are you applying for housing registration?

step6.title: Income Information
step6.description: Please provide information about your income.
step6.note: Income information is used to determine eligibility for different housing programs. You may be asked to provide proof of income later in the process.

step7.title: Special Needs & Urgency
step7.description: Do you have any special circumstances that require urgent attention?
step7.infoText: Special circumstances may affect your position on the waiting list. Please provide accurate information. Documentation may be required for verification.
step7.disabilityDescription: You or a household member has a disability or medical condition requiring specific housing accommodations.
step7.emergencyDescription: You are facing an emergency situation such as homelessness, displacement due to calamity, or imminent eviction.
step7.detailsLabel: Please provide details about your situation
step7.detailsHelp: This information will be reviewed to assess urgency priority.

step8.title: Review Your Registration
step8.description: Please verify all information before submitting.
step8.declarationText: I hereby declare that all information provided in this registration is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that providing false information may result in removal from the waiting list and possible legal consequences.

step9.successText: Your housing registration has been submitted. Please save the information below.
step9.referenceNumberHelp: Use this number to track your registration status
step9.securityTokenWarning: Save this token securely. You will need both the reference number and this token to check your registration status online. This token will only be displayed once.
step9.nextStep1Text: Your registration will be verified by the housing department.
step9.nextStep2Text: Once verified, you will be placed on the official waiting list.
step9.nextStep3Text: You will be contacted when housing becomes available for you.

step8documents.title: Upload Documents
step8documents.description: Upload the required documents to proceed with your registration.
step8documents.infoText: All mandatory documents must be uploaded before you can submit your registration. Supported file types: PDF, JPG, PNG. Maximum file size: 10MB per document.
step8documents.dropzone: Drop file here or click to upload
step8documents.invalidType: Invalid file type. Use PDF, JPG, or PNG.
step8documents.mandatoryMissing: Upload all mandatory documents to proceed

form.accessTokenHelp: The access token was shown once when your application was submitted

result.foundText: Here is the current status of your application

step0.title: Welcome to the Construction Subsidy Application
step0.description: Please read the following information carefully before proceeding.
step0.noticeText: Applications submitted through this portal are for registration purposes only. No evaluation or decision will be made at the counter. All applications will be reviewed by the appropriate department and you will be contacted regarding the outcome.
step0.process1Text: Complete this form with your information
step0.process2Text: Your application will be reviewed by staff
step0.process3Text: You will be contacted with the outcome
step0.acknowledgementLabel: I understand that this is a registration portal only and that no evaluation or decision will be made at the counter. I confirm that I will provide accurate information.

step1.title: Personal Identification
step1.description: Please provide your personal details as they appear on your National ID.

step2.title: Contact Information
step2.description: How can we reach you regarding your application?

step3.title: Household Information
step3.description: Tell us about your household composition.
step3.householdSizePlaceholder: Total number of people in household
step3.dependentsHelp: Children or others who depend on you financially (optional)

step5.title: Application Details
step5.description: Tell us more about your construction subsidy request.
step5.applicationReasonPlaceholder: Select the reason for your application
step5.isCalamityDescription: Check this box if your application is due to a natural disaster, fire, or other emergency situation
step5.emergencyText: Emergency applications may be eligible for expedited processing. Please ensure you have documentation of the emergency situation available for verification.

step6.title: Upload Documents
step6.description: Upload the required documents to proceed with your application.
step6.infoText: All mandatory documents must be uploaded before you can submit your application. Supported file types: PDF, JPG, PNG. Maximum file size: 10MB per document.
step6.dropzone: Drop file here or click to upload
step6.invalidType: Invalid file type. Use PDF, JPG, or PNG.
step6.mandatoryMissing: Upload all mandatory documents to continue

step7.title: Review Your Application
step7.description: Please verify all information before submitting.
step7.declarationText: I hereby declare that all information provided in this application is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that providing false information may result in rejection of my application and possible legal consequences.

step8.successText: Your construction subsidy application has been registered. Please save the information below.
step8.referenceNumberHelp: Use this number to track your application status
step8.securityTokenWarning: Save this token securely. You will need both the reference number and this token to check your application status online. This token will only be displayed once.
step8.nextStep1Text: Your application will be reviewed by the Volkshuisvesting department.
step8.nextStep2Text: Your uploaded documents will be verified.
step8.nextStep3Text: You will be contacted via phone regarding the outcome of your application.
